  • corps is the body to which this structure belongs
jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::BodyThis object is used to compute the Center Of Masse, and store some basic information of each body of the robot
jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::DynamicBody
jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::DynamicMultiBodyThis class simulates the dynamic of a multibody robot

jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::HumanoidDynamicMultiBodyThis class implements the functionnalities specific to a dynamic model for a humanoid
jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::HumanoidSpecificities
jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::internalLinkInternallink structure: Define a link between two bodys: Supported types:
  • Free joint (6 DoFs) (type = FREE_JOINT)
  • Fixed joint (0 DoF) (type = FIX_JOINT)
  • Prismatic joint (1 DoF) (type = PRISMATIC_JOINT)
  • Revolute joint (1 DoF) (type = REVOLUTE_JOINT)
jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::JointDefine a transformation from a body to another Supported type:
  • Rotation around an axis with a quantity (type = ROTATION)
  • Translation of a vector : quantite*axe (type = TRANSLATION)
  • Rotation through a homogeneous matrix : *rotation (type = FREE_LIBRE)
jrlCIRdynamicsJRLJapan::MultiBodyThis class implements a non-oriented graph for which the nodes are bodies (Body) and the edges are joints (internalLink)
